mapper.sql: id, hosp_code, code, name, reg_code, org_code, attr_code, type_code, url, request_code, time_out, username, password, contact, email, phone, is_remote, is_valid, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, mdtrtarea_admvs, is_unified_pay

ic.id, ic.hosp_code, ic.code, ic.name, ic.reg_code, ic.org_code, ic.attr_code, ic.type_code, ic.url, ic.request_code, ic.time_out, ic.username, ic.password, ic.contact, ic.email, ic.phone, ic.is_remote, ic.is_valid, ic.remark, ic.crte_id, ic.crte_name, ic.crte_time, ic.mdtrtarea_admvs, ic.is_unified_pay
mapper.insert: insert into insure_configuration ( id, hosp_code, code, name, reg_code, org_code, attr_code, type_code, url, request_code, time_out, username, password, contact, email, phone, is_remote, is_valid, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, mdtrtarea_admvs, is_unified_pay ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRemote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mdtrtareaAdmvs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUnifiedPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mdtrtarea_admvs

mapper.update: update insure_configuration set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_code = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_code = #{attrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_code = #{requestCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_out = #{timeOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_remote = #{isRemote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crte_id = #{crteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crte_name = #{crteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crte_time = #{crteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mdtrtarea_admvs = #{mdtrtareaAdmvs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_unified_pay = #{isUnifiedPay, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

update insure_configuration
hosp_code = #{hospCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_code = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attr_code = #{attrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_code = #{requestCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_out = #{timeOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_remote = #{isRemote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crte_id = #{crteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crte_name = #{crteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crte_time = #{crteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mdtrtarea_admvs = #{mdtrtareaAdmvs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
is_unified_pay = #{isUnifiedPay, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select b.insure_item_code prodCode, case when a.item_code = '1' then bd.code when a.item_code = '2' then bm.code end as fixmedinsHilistId, a.item_name as fixmedinsHilistName,'0' as rxFlag,now() as invdate, '' as manuLotnum,'' as fixmedinsBchno, '' as manuDate,'' as expyEnd,'' as memo,'' as invChgType,'' as pric, sum(a.num) as invCnt, '0' as trdnFlag from stro_stock a left join base_drug bd on a.item_id = bd.id and a.hosp_code = bd.hosp_code left join base_material bm on a.item_id = bm.id and a.hosp_code = bm.hosp_code join insure_item_match b on a.item_id = b.hosp_item_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code where b.is_valid = '1' AND b.is_match = '1' and b.is_trans = '1' and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.item_code = #{itemCode} group by b.insure_item_code
